parsedContentPreview: {"id":"egyptian-verbs-101","title":{"arabic":"إتقان تصريف الأفعال المصرية","english":"Mastering Egyptian Verb Conjugation","transliteration":"Etqan Tasreef El Af3al El Masreya"},"level":"beginner","description":{"english":"A comprehensive guide to the most challenging part of Arabic: Verb conjugation. Learn how to change verbs for past, present, and future tenses across all persons in the Egyptian dialect.","arabic":"دليل شامل لأصعب جزء في العربي: تصريف الأفعال. اتعلم ازاي تغير الأفعال للماضي والحاضر والمستقبل مع كل الضماير باللهجة المصرية."},"learningObjectives":["Understand the structure of the Present, Past, and Future tenses in Egyptian Arabic","Conjugate regular verbs for all pronouns (I, You, He, She, We, They)","Distinguish between masculine and feminine forms in conjugation","Learn common irregular verbs like 'to go' and 'to eat'","Form negative sentences using conjugated verbs"],"estimatedDuration":60,"prerequisites":["Basic Egyptian Arabic Pronouns","Reading Arabic Script (Basic)"],"subLessons":[{"id":"sl-1-present-tense","title":{"arabic":"الفعل المضارع","english":"The Present Tense","transliteration":"El Fe3l El Modare3"},"content":{"title":{"arabic":"أنا بكتب وبشرب","english":"I am writing and drinking","transliteration":"Ana baktib we bashrab"},"phrases":[{"arabic":"أنا بكتب الدرس","english":"I am writing the lesson","transliteration":"Ana baktib el dars"},{"arabic":"إنت بتشرب شاي","english":"You (male) are drinking tea","transliteration":"Enta betishrab shay"},{"arabic":"هي بتكتب رسالة","english":"She is writing a message","transliteration":"Heya betiktib resala"},{"arabic":"إحنا بنلعب كورة","english":"We are playing football","transliteration":"E7na benel3ab kora"},{"arabic":"هم بياكلوا","english":"They are eating","transliteration":"Homma byaklo"}],"explanations":[{"english":"In Egyptian Arabic, we often add the letter 'b' (بـ) to the beginning of the verb to indicate a habit or a continuous action in the present."}]},"exercises":[{"id":"ex-1-match-
